message: Let's start with a fair split.  I think this is a good starting point for us.
Your offer was generous, but I believe this split better reflects the decreasing value of the money over time.
I understand the value of the money is changing. I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I'd like to see a fairer split for myself as well.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer. It reflects the time pressure and the decreasing value of the money for you.
